channel.title: Zygaria - Truly Unique || Summoning || 100% Skills || Content Full || TRY US!
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://zygaria.com"] [IMG]http://zygaria.com/img/banner.gif[/img] [size=14pt]Check Us Out![/size][/URL][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img]
[I]Zygaria may be looked upon as a ordinary server. However this is far from the actual truth, Zygaria unlike many servers, is a created for the players. We strive on creating the 'Perfect' server.
We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at Zygaria.
Zygaria is not just a 'game' but a place to relax and enjoy yourself. We try our absolute best on having a fun and safe environment. We believe that everyone should treated the same no matter what. We are all strong. We are all confident. Zygaria is a World unlike any other you have played![/I]
Recent Updates: [img]http://puu.sh/3JBSl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img]
Features:
-Pk Server Online , Best of both world ECO/PK -All Weapon Specials 100% -100% Overloads -PERFECT Switching -PERFECT Combat -Free For All Minigame(in development) -100% Animated Nex -100% Animated Nomad -100% Animad Jad -100% Corporeal Beast -Pk Title Shops -Donator Crown Support -All Pvp Armours & Weapons 100% -All Nex Armours 100% With Effect -No Lag -VPS Hosted -Custom Interfaces -Symbols (<>^\) Support -Better graphics -Player Clipping -NPC Clipping -Spawn Tab -Interactive Quest Tab -All Dungeoneering Items + Effects -Much More!
[b][size=12pt]Images:[/size][/b]
Monster Teleports [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q8PQf64.png[/img]
Shop Overview [img]http://i.imgur.com/I5LMUMt.png[/img]
Polypore Dungeon [img]http://i.imgur.com/cU4iIhc.png[/img]
Revenant Dungeon [img]http://i.imgur.com/5X3RrZY.png[/img]
Glacor Cavern [img]http://i.imgur.com/bszzxOE.png[/img]
100% Clan Chat [img]http://i.imgur.com/8PyAJzy.png[/img]
100% Summoning [img]http://i.imgur.com/WrOVGq7.png[/img]
Polypore Staff + PKing [img]http://i.imgur.com/UgU3FVU.png[/img]
Completionist cape customizing [img]http://i.imgur.com/oFPsFQ7.png[/img]
Dungeoneering [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZDEwURN.png[/img]
100% Barrows [img]http://i.imgur.com/at7dfjt.png[/img]
100% Pest Control [img]http://i.imgur.com/OoLKn9G.png[/img]
Home [img]http://i.imgur.com/VasOCPY.png[/img]

[/quote]

The links should already be fixed though…

[CENTER]

[I]Zygaria may be looked upon as a ordinary server. However this is far from the actual truth, Zygaria unlike many servers, is a created for the players. We strive on creating the ‘Perfect’ server.

We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at Zygaria.

Zygaria is not just a ‘game’ but a place to relax and enjoy yourself. We try our absolute best on having a fun and safe environment. We believe that everyone should treated the same no matter what. We are all strong. We are all confident. Zygaria is a World unlike any other you have played![/I]
